name: 陳舒惠
objective:
本課程介紹西洋藝術之審美與欣賞。包含從古希臘時期到俄羅斯前衛主義之西方藝術作品賞析。以編年和主題式的編排，並特別強調藝術風格的源流與內容分析。使學生理解在不同的社會、文化、宗教和歷史背景之下，各個時期的藝術家，創作出的作品成就。
This course introduces the aesthetic and appreciation of Western art, which includes works in the ancient Greek period to the Russian avant-garde. To choreographers and thematic choreography, it would particular emphasis on techniques and content analysis, so that students could understand the different social, cultural, religious and historical background, and how the artists of all periods had created their works.
schedule:
1 introduction/ Prehistory
2 Ancient Greece and Ancient Rome/ Hellenistic art
3 Art byzantin/ Medieval art
4 the beginnings of the Renaissance/The renaissance of the north
5 The Renaissance/The High Renaissance/The Venetian Renaissance 
6 Mannerism/The Dutch Golden Age
7 Baroque / Rococo
8 Neoclassicism / Romanticism
9 Realism / Impressionism
10 Post-Impressionism / Neo-Impressionism
11 Art Nouveau / Expressionism
12 Fauvism / Cubism
13 Futurism / Suprematism
14 Dada / Neuroplasticism
15 magical realism / surrealism
16 Abstract expressionism / the color field
17 pop art / the art of performance
18 minimalism / conceptual art
